snippet: After the unmistakably weak employment report for April, it’s obvious that the economy will not heal itself without more government help.
abstract: Editorial charges that the unmistakably weak employment report for April makes clear that the economy will not heal itself without more government help.
lead_paragraph: After the unmistakably weak employment report for April, it’s obvious that the economy will not heal itself without more government help.

headline.print_headline: A Clear Warning From the Jobs Numbers
headline.seo: A Clear Warning From the Jobs Numbers
headline.main: A Clear Warning From the Jobs Numbers
